docs.title: How to print the report without margin | Reports
docs.content:
## How to print the report without margin

By using the `Margin` property, you can set `0` for the left, right, top, and bottom spacing of the report layout to print the report without margin.

![Rectangle listed in item panel](./images/margin-property.png)
docs.description: This section explains how to print the report without margin in Bold Reports Embedded reporting tools.
